StdThreadController¶

Brief Description: Standard thread controller using std::mutex.

Detailed Description:

This class implements the ThreadController interface using std::mutex for thread safety. It provides methods to acquire and release locks, and to get the unique identifier of the current thread.

In file src/core/std_thread_controller.hh
